   (b) NCE credit/merit passes in addition to TCII merit or 'O’ 
level credit passes in relevant subjects.  
 (xx)  MAKURDI accept  
(a) two (2)'A’ level passes in physics    
(b) Holders of the UTME requirements plus'A’ level passes 
in the relevant science subjects.                     
(c) ND holders with upper credits in relevant programme 
who possess the UTME requirements.   
(d) NCE holders with two (2) credit passes in relevant 
subjects who possess the UTME requirements may be 
admitted into 200 level.  
(xxi) EDKANO - Candidates must obtain not less than eight  
(8) points in NCE.  
(xxii) SOSU also accepts   
a. NCE passes in Chemistry and any other Science 
subject;Physics, Biology, Mathematics or Computer 
Science or a double major subject with O’ level 
requirement.  
b. IJMB passes in Chemistry and one (1) Science subject 
Physics, Biology, Mathematics or Computer Science 
with the'O’ level requirements.  
c. ND/HND with 'O' level pass in Chemistry or any 
relevant subject into 100 level.  
(xxiii) AAUA Accepts NCE merit including Chemistry, 
Education and one (1) other relevant teaching 
subject.  
(xxiv) FED-DUTSINMA accepts two (2) ‘A’ level passes in 
Chemistry and any one (1) of Physics, Mathematics or 
Biology.  
  
UTME  
(i) AAUA requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes 
including  English  Language,  Chemistry, 
Mathematics and any two (2) of Physics, Biology 
and Agricultural Science.  
(ii) ABU accepts  
(a) two (2) 'A' level/NCE/IJMB with 'C‘grade in Chemistry and 
any other Science subject.
